definition: to cry (of birds, animals and insects)/to make a sound/to voice (one's gratitude, grievance etc)

sentences.chinese: 悲鸣从咬紧的牙缝中挤出。

sentences.english: Swallow poor lament only to find shelter in place everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 可怜的燕子只有在悲鸣中到处寻觅安身之地。

sentences.english: It sounds as though you were lamenting, a butterfly cooinglike a dove.
sentences.chinese: 你听起来像在悲叹，一只如同悲鸣的蝴蝶。

sentences.english: A loud sob broke out of me, like a bark.
sentences.chinese: 我发出一声悲鸣，就像一声嚎叫。

sentences.english: A long plaintive wail emanated from the cardboard box.
sentences.chinese: 纸箱里发出一声长长的悲鸣。

sentences.english: At the sorrow of my sweet pipings.

sentences.chinese: 让飞机在上空盘旋悲鸣。

sentences.english: He whined and licked my hand.
sentences.chinese: 它呜呜悲鸣，舔了舔我的手。

definition: (of animals, the wind etc) to make a mournful sound/whine/moan/wail
to cry piteously/anguished wailing/same as 哀嚎
to whinny (of a horse)/to neigh/to shout
to howl in grief/anguished wailing/same as 哀号
to face upwards/to look up to the sky
to roar/to thunder/to snarl/to bluster (of wind, waves etc)/crashing waves (onom.)/to rage (of a person)
